channel.title: CVE Feed for Tenable -- Nessus Network Monitor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tenable -- Nessus Network Monitor

item.title: CVE-2023-5624|2024-09-09T15:48:24.575Z -- tenable -- nessus%20network%20monitor
item.description: Under certain conditions, Nessus Network Monitor was found to not properly enforce input validation. This could allow an admin user to alter parameters that could potentially allow a blindSQL injection.

item.title: CVE-2023-5623|2024-09-09T15:50:01.791Z -- tenable -- nessus%20network%20monitor
item.description: NNM failed to properly set ACLs on its installation directory, which could allow a low privileged user to run arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges where NNM is installed to a non-standard location
